message: I'm offering you a product for $100. I'm not sure if it's high-quality or low-quality, but I'm willing to give you a 50% chance of getting a high-quality product if you buy from me. Is that worth the risk to you?
I'd like to pass on this one. I'll wait for the next round.

I've got a new product for you! I know this one is high-quality, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. I'm willing to give you a 10% discount if you buy it now, but if you wait for the next round, the price will go back to $100. What do you say?
I'm not convinced that the product is actually high-quality. I'll pass and wait for the next round.

I've got another product for you. I'll be honest with you, this one is not as good as the last one. It's not worth the full $100, but I'm willing to sell it to you for that price. I'm hoping you'll take a chance on it because I'm willing to offer a'satisfaction guarantee' - if you don't like it, I'll give you a refund. What do you think?
I'm not convinced that the product is worth $100, and the satisfaction guarantee doesn't change my mind. I'll pass and wait for the next round.

I've got a high-quality product for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. I know you've been skeptical in the past, but I want to assure you that this one is the real deal. I'll even throw in a personalized thank-you note from me, the seller, to guarantee your satisfaction. What do you say?
Okay, I'll take a chance on this one. I'm willing to believe that this one is high-quality and the personalized note might be a nice touch.

I'll take the deal! The discount and the free accessory make it a good value, and I'm willing to take a chance on this one.

If you buy this product, I'll give you a second product of equal or lesser value for 50% off. It's a great opportunity to stock up and save some money. What do you think?
I'm not convinced that the second product is worth the 50% off, considering the last product was low-quality. I'll pass on this deal.

I understand your skepticism, and I want to assure you that this one is not like the last low-quality product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $60, which is a 40% discount from the regular price. I'm also including a 30-day money-back guarantee, so if you're not satisfied, you can return it for a full refund. It's a low-risk, low-cost option that might be worth considering.
The discount and the money-back guarantee make this a low-risk option. I'll take a chance on it.

I'm not convinced that this product is worth the risk, even with the discount and the voucher. I'll pass and wait for the next round.

I'll take the deal. The extreme discount and the 'get out of one bad deal free' card make it a good value, even if the product is low-quality.
